jhelp.android.api.text2speech

Class Speecher

  • java.lang.Object
    • jhelp.android.api.text2speech.Speecher

  • public class Speecher
extends java.lang.Object
    Speecher for exchange with text to speech.
    To avoid leak or dead object issue, please call destroy() beofre exiting your application or whn you don't want more deal with text to speech
    Author:
    JHelp

    • Method Detail

      • obtainSpeecher

        public static Speecher obtainSpeecher(Context context)
        Obtain a speecher for a context.
        For first access from a context, its recommend to use obtainSpeecher(Context, SpeecherListener) if you want have speecher status information
        Parameters:
        context - Context to use
        Returns:
        Speecher instance

      • obtainSpeecher

        public static Speecher obtainSpeecher(Context context,
                      SpeecherListener speecherListener)
        Obtain a speecher for a context.
        Parameters:
        context - Context to use
        speecherListener - Listener to use. Can be null and used only at the first calling of this method for a given context
        Returns:
        Speecher instance

      • isLocaleSuported

        public boolean isLocaleSuported(java.util.Locale locale)
                         throws RemoteException
        Indicates if a language is suported
        If the link to service not already established, false is return
        Parameters:
        locale - Locale tested
        Returns:
        true if language supported, false if not supported or service is not ready
        Throws:
        RemoteException - On broken link

        Returns:
